config.main.title: Main Settings
config.enable.name: Enable Mod
config.enable.tooltip: Enable or disable the fishing bar growth feature.
config.fishPerPixel.name: Fish Per Pixel
config.fishPerPixel.tooltip: How many fish you need to catch to increase the fishing bar by 1 pixel. Default: 10
config.maxHeight.name: Max Bar Height
config.maxHeight.tooltip: Maximum height of the fishing bar in pixels. Set to 0 for unlimited. Default: 600
config.excludeAlgae.name: Exclude Algae
config.excludeAlgae.tooltip: Exclude algae and seaweed (IDs: 152, 153, 157) from fish count.
config.hud.title: HUD Display Settings
config.showHUD.name: Show Fishing HUD
config.showHUD.tooltip: Display fishing statistics in the bottom-left corner when holding a fishing rod.
config.hudX.name: HUD Horizontal Position
config.hudX.tooltip: Distance from the left edge of the screen in pixels. Default: 20
config.hudY.name: HUD Vertical Position
config.hudY.tooltip: Distance from the bottom of the screen in pixels. Default: 180
config.debug.title: Debug Settings
config.debugInfo.name: Show Debug Info
config.debugInfo.tooltip: Display debug information in the console when fishing.
hud.title: Fishing Statistics
